FYI, a bug is not resolved until it is committed ... :)

Case in point : 

While the title of the defect was about getting rid of the NPE, the spirit of 
the defect was about actually getting the JUnit suite to pass this test.  You 
have added an assertion which circumvents the Error but not the overall 
Failure.  Thus, I need to reopen this defect.

Reproduced it today using latest out of CVS on Windows XP, JDK 1.3. 
Reopening this defect.
